trans-unit.source: Cancellation Addendum
trans-unit.target: 取消附例

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Book
trans-unit.target: 預訂前須知

trans-unit.source: Partial cancellation is not available for roundtrip transfers.
trans-unit.target: 不接受取消部分來回接送。

trans-unit.source: This transfer operates 24 hours a day.
trans-unit.target: 此接送服務 24 小時提供。

trans-unit.source: 3 standard-size bags are allowed per vehicle.
trans-unit.target: 每輛車可以運載 3 件標準尺寸行李。

trans-unit.source: Additional baggage is subject to space availability and may incur an extra surcharge, which is payable to your driver at the time of service.
trans-unit.target: 需根據可用空間決定是否可容納額外行李，並需要在使用服務時向您的司機支付額外費用。

trans-unit.source: Photographs are meant to illustrate vehicle type only; your vehicle may differ from what is pictured.
trans-unit.target: 相片展示的車輛類型僅作參考，您的車輛可能與相片中的有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Go
trans-unit.target: 出發前須知

trans-unit.source: If you miss your flight or change your itinerary, you must immediately contact Connexxion Schiphol to reschedule your transfer.
trans-unit.target: 如您錯過航班或已變更行程，必須立即聯絡 Connexxion Schiphol 以重新安排交通。

trans-unit.source: If you have trouble locating your driver, please call the number provided.
trans-unit.target: 如無法找到司機，請撥打所提供的電話號碼。

trans-unit.source: This transfer operates 24 hours a day.
trans-unit.target: 此接送服務 24 小時提供。

trans-unit.source: 3 standard-size bags are allowed per vehicle.
trans-unit.target: 每輛車可以運載 3 件標準尺寸行李。

trans-unit.source: This standard car accommodates up to 3 passengers.
trans-unit.target: 此標準房車可接送最多 3 位乘客。

trans-unit.source: Private Standard Car: Amsterdam Airport (AMS)
trans-unit.target: 私人標準房車：阿姆斯特丹機場 (AMS)

trans-unit.source: {1}Enjoy convenient private transportation between Amsterdam Schiphol Airport and your hotel in the comfort of a standard car.
trans-unit.target: {1}乘坐舒適的標準房車，享受方便的私人接送服務，往返阿姆斯特丹史基浦機場和您的酒店。

trans-unit.source: For transfers to and from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport, the zones to select from include:{2}{3}{4}{5}Amsterdam City Center{6} {7}{8}Select this option for hotels located in Amsterdam city center.
trans-unit.target: 往返阿姆斯特丹史基浦機場的接送服務，可選擇區域如下：{2} {3} {4} {5}阿姆斯特丹市中心{6} {7} {8}如酒店位於阿姆斯特丹市中心，請選擇此選項。

trans-unit.source: {9}{10}Available Neighborhoods:{11}{12}- Amsterdam North, Amsterdam RAI - World Trade Center, Amsterdam South, Amsterdam West, Canal Ring {13}{14}- Dam Square - Central Station, De Pijp, Jordaan, Museum Quarter, Oost-Watergraafsmeer{15}{16}- Plantage - Eastern Docklands, Schiphol Airport (AMS), Vondelpark{17}
trans-unit.target: {9} {10}可選擇的區域：{11} {12}- 阿姆斯特丹北部、阿姆斯特丹 RAI - 世界貿易中心、阿姆斯特丹南部、阿姆斯特丹西部、Canal Ring (運河環) {13} {14}- 水壩廣場 - 中央車站、德派普、約丹、博物館區、Oost-Watergraafsmeer{15} {16}- 普蘭德基 - 東部港區、史基浦機場 (AMS)、馮德爾公園{17}

trans-unit.source: Redemption Instructions
trans-unit.target: 換領方法

trans-unit.source: {18}{19}Please contact Connexxion Schiphol at least 72 hours prior to your scheduled service to confirm the pick-up location and time for your transfer.
trans-unit.target: {18} {19}請於預定服務時間至少 72 小時前聯絡 Connexxion Schiphol，以確認接載地點及接送時間。

trans-unit.source: {20}{21}{22}{23}You must send an email with the following information:{24}{25}- Itinerary number and name as subject line{26}{27}- Arrival flight details: flight number, arrival date, and time{28}{29}- Hotel details: hotel name, check-in, and check-out dates{30}{31}- Departure flight details (if return transfer booked): flight number, departure date, and time{32}{33}{34}{35}Note: If you have booked this transportation service along with hotel and flight in the same transaction, the above instructions do not apply{36}{37}{38}{39}{40}Airport Pickup:{41} Upon arrival, please collect your baggage and proceed through customs.
trans-unit.target: {20} {21} {22} {23}您必須向旅行社發送載有以下資料的電郵：{24} {25}- 以行程編號及姓名作為標題{26} {27}- 入境航班資料：航班編號、抵達日期及時間{28} {29}- 酒店資料：酒店名稱、入住及退房日期{30} {31}- 離境航班資料 (如預訂來回接送)：航班編號、離境日期及時間{32} {33} {34} {35}注意：如果您以同一交易預訂此接送服務、酒店及航班，則不適用以上說明{36} {37} {38} {39} {40}機場接機：{41}抵達後，請領取行李，並通過海關。

trans-unit.source: Follow the "Amsterdam Shuttle Desk" sign to Arrivals Hall 4.
trans-unit.target: Follow the "Amsterdam Shuttle Desk" sign to Arrivals Hall 4.

alt-trans.source: Follow the “Amsterdam Shuttle Desk” sign to Arrivals Hall 4.
alt-trans.target: 沿著「阿姆斯特丹接駁車服務台」的指示牌前往 4 號入境大堂。

trans-unit.source: A customer services representative is available to assist you with your transfer at the Connexxion desk between 7 AM and 9 PM; outside these times, your driver will be waiting for you at the desk.
trans-unit.target: A customer services representative is available to assist you with your transfer at the Connexxion desk between 7 AM and 9 PM; outside these times, your driver will be waiting for you at the desk.

trans-unit.source: Present your confirmation and photo ID to the driver or representative for pickup.
trans-unit.target: Present your confirmation and photo ID to the driver or representative for pickup.

trans-unit.source: {42}{43}{44}{45}Hotel Pickup:{46} Please call Connexxion Schiphol at least 24 hours before your scheduled service date in order to confirm your pick-up time.
trans-unit.target: {42}{43}{44}{45}酒店接載：{46}請在預定的服務日期至少 24 小時前致電 Connexxion Schiphol，以確認您的接載時間。

trans-unit.source: Your driver meets you in the lobby of your hotel; please be ready and waiting 15 minutes before the meeting time.
trans-unit.target: 司機會在酒店大堂內與您會合；請在集合時間前 15 分鐘在場等候。

trans-unit.source: Present your confirmation and photo ID to the driver upon pickup.
trans-unit.target: 請於獲接送時向司機出示您的確認信及附有照片的身份證明。

trans-unit.source: Suggested For
trans-unit.target: 適合以下人士

trans-unit.source: Terms and Conditions
trans-unit.target: 條款及細則

trans-unit.source: {48}Rate is per vehicle and is valid for private transfers between Amsterdam Schiphol Airport and your Amsterdam city center hotel only.
trans-unit.target: {48}收費以每輛車計算，只適用於阿姆斯特丹史基浦機場及您的阿姆斯特丹酒店私人接送。

trans-unit.source: If your hotel falls outside this zone, your service cannot be guaranteed, and you may need to pay an additional charge directly to the service provider at the time of service.
trans-unit.target: 如您下榻的酒店位處您預訂的區域以外，將無法確保為您提供的服務，同時您或需在上車時直接向服務商支付額外費用。

trans-unit.source: {49}{50}{51}Partial cancellation is not available for roundtrip transfers.
trans-unit.target: {49} {50} {51}不接受取消部分來回接送。

trans-unit.source: {52}{53}{54}Photographs are meant to illustrate vehicle type only; your vehicle may differ from what is pictured.
trans-unit.target: {52}{53}{54}相片展示的車輛類型僅作參考，您的車輛可能與相片中的有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Inclusions
trans-unit.target: 包括項目

trans-unit.source: One-way or roundtrip transfer from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport via standard car
trans-unit.target: 阿姆斯特丹史基浦機場單程或來回標準房車接送服務

trans-unit.source: Assistance from the Arrivals Hall
trans-unit.target: 接機大堂協助

trans-unit.source: Air-conditioned vehicle
trans-unit.target: 空調車輛

trans-unit.source: Cancellation Addendum
trans-unit.target: 取消附例

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Book
trans-unit.target: 預訂前須知

trans-unit.source: You must be 12 or older.
trans-unit.target: 閣下必須年滿 12 歲。

trans-unit.source: You must be able to ride a bicycle on your own.
trans-unit.target: 閣下必須可自行踏單車。

trans-unit.source: You can pick up your bike daily, between 9 AM and 6 PM.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從每日 09:00-18:00 領取單車。

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Go
trans-unit.target: 出發前須知

trans-unit.source: You can pick up your bike daily, between 9 AM and 6 PM.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從每日 09:00-18:00 領取單車。

trans-unit.source: Amsterbike reserves the right to refuse anyone who appears to be under the influence of drugs or alcohol.
trans-unit.target: Amsterbike 保留權利拒絕任何疑似受藥物或酒精影響的人士參與活動。

trans-unit.source: Helmets and locks are available for rent at Amsterbike's tour office.
trans-unit.target: 頭盔和鎖可於 Amsterbike 的旅遊辦公室租賃。

trans-unit.source: Bike Rental with a Cup of Coffee
trans-unit.target: Bike Rental with a Cup of Coffee

trans-unit.source: {1}Go local, and hop on a bike to explore the charming Dutch capital at your leisure.
Extensive, well-marked lanes make the adventure enjoyable for young and old alike.
trans-unit.target: Extensive, well-marked lanes make the adventure enjoyable for young and old alike.

alt-trans.source: Extensive, well-marked lanes make the experience enjoyable for young and old alike.
alt-trans.target: 大量標示清晰的小巷帶來難忘體驗，而且老少皆宜，都可盡情享受。

trans-unit.source: A delicious cup of coffee is also thrown in to complete the experience.
trans-unit.target: A delicious cup of coffee is also thrown in to complete the experience.

trans-unit.source: {2}{3}{4}Almost a third of the country’s population lists cycling as a daily activity—it is a ubiquitous transport mode in the Holland.

alt-trans.source: {1}{2}{3}Almost a third of the country’s population lists cycling as a daily activity—it isit’s a ubiquitous transport mode in the Holland.
alt-trans.target: {1} {2} {3}近全國三分之一的人口都視騎自行車為日常生活的一部份，在荷蘭它是一種普遍的運輸方式。

trans-unit.source: Customize your route around your preferences, and put Amsterdam’s 248- mile (400-km)--long (400 km) bike lanes to good use.
trans-unit.target: 按自己喜好自訂您的路線，善用阿姆斯特丹 248 英里 (400 公里) 長 (400 公里) 的單車道。

trans-unit.source: Navigate with ease with an informative city map highlighting top attractions and including and recommended routes as well.
trans-unit.target: Navigate with ease with an informative city map highlighting top attractions and including and recommended routes as well.

trans-unit.source: {5}{6}{7}Get the chance to see the enchanting UNESCO-listed grachts (canals), the Anne Frank Museum, the Royal Palace, and the Van Gogh Museum.
trans-unit.target: {5} {6} {7}有機會欣賞列入聯合國教科文組織的迷人世界遺產 - grachts (運河) 安妮弗蘭克博物館、王宮和梵高博物館。

trans-unit.source: Meander through the infamous Red Light District and discover the Old Church, Chinatown, and many coffee shops at your own pace.
trans-unit.target: 蜿蜒穿過著名紅燈區，按自己的節奏探索舊教堂、唐人街和林立的咖啡室。

trans-unit.source: {8}{9}{10}Take a leisurely break at a popular café, and watch the world go by with a cuppa in your hands.
Redemption Instructions
trans-unit.target: 換領方法

trans-unit.source: {12}Upon arrival at the redemption location, please present your confirmation/voucher or photo ID in exchange for your activity.
trans-unit.target: {12}抵達換領地點時，請出示您的確認信/代用券或附有照片的身份證明，以換領活動。

trans-unit.source: {13}{14}{15}Look for the yellow flag on the street, indicating the location of the Amsterbike tour office, next to the entrance of the Movenpick Hotel.
trans-unit.target: {13} {14} {15}尋找街道上的黃旗，這表示 Amsterbike 旅遊辦公室的位置，在莫文皮克酒店主入口的旁邊。

trans-unit.source: Suggested For
trans-unit.target: 適合以下人士

trans-unit.source: Terms and Conditions
trans-unit.target: 條款及細則

trans-unit.source: Highlights
trans-unit.target: 重點

trans-unit.source: An authentic local perspective of the city from a bike
trans-unit.target: 正宗當地角度，從單車觀賞城市

trans-unit.source: Extensive, well-marked & flat bike lanes for a safe tour
trans-unit.target: 大量標示清晰而平坦的單車道令您可安全遊覽

trans-unit.source: Watching the world go by with a cup of coffee in hands
trans-unit.target: Watching the world go by with a cup of coffee in hands

trans-unit.source: Informative map with top attractions & route recommendations
trans-unit.target: 詳細地圖介紹著名景點和建議路線

trans-unit.source: Freedom to explore the town at your own pace
trans-unit.target: 自由隨意探索市內風光

trans-unit.source: Inclusions
trans-unit.target: 包括項目

trans-unit.source: 1-day bike rental
trans-unit.target: 1-day bike rental

trans-unit.source: One cup of coffee
trans-unit.target: One cup of coffee

trans-unit.source: City map
trans-unit.target: 城市地圖

trans-unit.source: 1-Day Bike Rental & a Cup of Coffee
trans-unit.target: 1-Day Bike Rental & a Cup of Coffee

trans-unit.source: Includes 1-day bike rental, and a coffee voucher.
trans-unit.target: Includes 1-day bike rental, and a coffee voucher.

trans-unit.source: Cancellation Addendum
trans-unit.target: 取消附例

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Book
trans-unit.target: 預訂前須知

trans-unit.source: Children 3 and younger are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不接待 3 歲或以下兒童。

trans-unit.source: You must be 18 years of age and present a valid photo ID in order to consume alcohol.
trans-unit.target: 您必須年滿 18 歲，出示有效並附有照片的身份證明，方可購買酒精類飲品。

trans-unit.source: Maximum group size is 13 people.
trans-unit.target: 團體人數上限為 13 人。

trans-unit.source: Tour stops may vary.
trans-unit.target: 旅行團停靠處可能會有所更改。

trans-unit.source: Hotel pickup is available from most centrally located Hobart hotels.
trans-unit.target: 位於霍巴特市中心的大部分酒店均提供酒店接送服務。

trans-unit.source: Please arrange pickup from your hotel or a nearby location when you call to confirm your reservation.
trans-unit.target: 致電確認預訂時，請安排前往您的酒店或鄰近地點的接送服務。

trans-unit.source: Booster seats available upon request for children 3-8 years
trans-unit.target: 3-8 歲兒童可按需要提供兒童墊椅

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Go
trans-unit.target: 出發前須知

trans-unit.source: Hotel pickup is available from most centrally located Hobart hotels.
trans-unit.target: 位於荷巴特市中心的大部分酒店均提供酒店接送服務。

trans-unit.source: Please arrange pickup from your hotel or a nearby location when you call to confirm your reservation.
trans-unit.target: 致電確認預訂時，請安排前往您的酒店或鄰近地點的接送服務。

trans-unit.source: Gratuity is not included and is left to individual discretion.
trans-unit.target: 不包括小費，參加者應自行決定是否給予。

trans-unit.source: You should wear comfortable walking shoes.
trans-unit.target: 建議穿著舒適的步行鞋。

trans-unit.source: Bruny Island Gourmet Food, Sightseeing & Lighthouse Tour
trans-unit.target: 布魯尼島美食、觀光和燈塔之旅

trans-unit.source: {1}With its windswept beaches, lighthouse-topped sea cliffs, and eucalyptus-forested National Parks, Bruny Island is a wilderness lover's dream.
trans-unit.target: {1}海岸清風送爽，燈塔矗立於懸崖之上，國家公園內桉樹林青翠欲滴，布魯尼島原野風光令人樂而忘返。

trans-unit.source: It's also a prime foodie destination, producing some of Tasmania's finest gourmet treats.
trans-unit.target: 塔斯馬尼亞堪稱美食天堂，為您呈獻色香味美的精緻美食。

trans-unit.source: Taste and see the best of the island on this full-day outing.
trans-unit.target: 集觀光與美食於一身的環島一日遊。

trans-unit.source: {2}{3}{4}After being picked up from your hotel by our local island guides, travel to Bruny Island via van and ferry.
trans-unit.target: {2} {3} {4}當地導遊將會在您的酒店接您，然後乘坐小巴和渡輪前往布魯尼島。

trans-unit.source: Only 60 miles long (100 km) and home to just over 600 people, this tiny slice of coastal heaven boasts spectacular natural scenery.
trans-unit.target: 這座小島全長 60 英里 (100公里)，人口 600 多人，但卻擁有令人神往不已的壯麗自然風光。

trans-unit.source: Your local guide leads you to a beach to watch a colony of fairy penguins waddling into the waves and then for a walk along the sandy shoreline of Adventure Bay.
trans-unit.target: 當地導遊將帶領您到海灘，前往神仙企鵝領地，觀賞企鵝逐浪戲水，然後沿水清沙幼的探險灣畔漫步。

trans-unit.source: Keep your eyes peeled for white wallabies hopping in the brush as you stroll.
trans-unit.target: 漫步其間還可看見白色小袋鼠在樹叢中輕快跳躍的場景。

trans-unit.source: {5}{6}{7}All that walking is sure to work up an appetite, so head to Bruny Island Berry Farm for a fruity snack (seasonal) or stop for coffee at R-T Café and then pass through towering man ferns and eucalyptus groves to HIBA Fudge and Chocolate.
trans-unit.target: {5} {6} {7}漫步觀光之後定會胃口大開，這時便前往布魯尼島漿果園品嚐果味香濃的小吃 (菜餚視乎時節而定) 或在 R-T 餐廳喝一杯咖啡。飽餐之後，繼續驅車穿梭於軟樹蕨及桉樹叢中，最後到達 HIBA 糖果及朱古力店。

trans-unit.source: Try a sweet treat or 2 before continuing on to the 200-year-old Cape Bruny Lighthouse for your southern most lighthouse tour in Australia, where you can gaze out over the rocky coast and the waters of the Southern Ocean.
trans-unit.target: 品嚐少許甜食，接着前往有 200 年歷史的布魯尼角燈塔，遊歷澳大利亞最南端，眺望佈滿岩石的海岸和南大洋的海水。

trans-unit.source: {8}{9}{10}Enjoy a lunch of local produce and head to Bruny Island Cheese for your private cellar door tasting, where you can tuck into an array of award-winning dairy goods.
trans-unit.target: {8} {9} {10}享用當地特色的午餐，然後前往 Bruny Island Cheese，嘗試專屬地窖試食，品嚐各種獲將的奶類製品。

trans-unit.source: At Get Shucked Oysters, try a plump and briny mollusc pulled straight from the pristine waters of the d'Entrecasteaux Channel and then pull up a chair on the deck at Bruny Island Smoke House to sip a wine or whisky flight if you feel so inclined.
trans-unit.target: 您還可前往 Get Shucked Oysters 生蠔餐廳品嚐從當特卡斯特海峽清澈海水新鮮捕撈的各種貝類海鮮，肉質肥美鮮嫩，定會讓您大飽口福。如果想休閒放鬆，可到布魯尼島 Smoke House 酒吧的長椅上小酌一杯葡萄酒或威士忌。

trans-unit.source: Your tastings end on a sweet note, with a stop at Oakley's Gourmet Ice Creams or Nutpatch Nougat, before your return ride to Hobart.
trans-unit.target: 旅途結束前，您將在 Oakley's Gourmet Ice Creams 或 Nutpatch Nougat 甜品店稍作停留，然後驅車返回霍巴特市。

trans-unit.source: Redemption Instructions
trans-unit.target: 換領方法

trans-unit.source: You must contact Bruny Island Safaris at least 24 hours after booking has been made to confirm your reservation and arrange transportation, clearly stating your required pickup location.
trans-unit.target: You must contact Bruny Island Safaris at least 24 hours after booking has been made to confirm your reservation and arrange transportation, clearly stating your required pickup location.

trans-unit.source: Use the contact details on this voucher.
trans-unit.target: 請使用此代用券上的聯絡資料。

trans-unit.source: Upon pickup, please present your confirmation/voucher or photo ID in exchange for your activity.
trans-unit.target: 請於接載時出示確認門票/代用券或附有照片的身份證明，以換領活動門票。

trans-unit.source: Suggested For
trans-unit.target: 適合以下人士

trans-unit.source: Terms and Conditions
trans-unit.target: 條款及細則

trans-unit.source: Highlights
trans-unit.target: 重點

trans-unit.source: Stunning coastal scenery & native wildlife of Bruny Island
trans-unit.target: 飽覽壯觀的沿海風光以及布魯尼島粗獷的原野風光

trans-unit.source: Sample gourmets treats from the island producers
trans-unit.target: 品嚐島上各式美味小食

trans-unit.source: Private cheese tasting with fresh oysters, chocolate & fudge
trans-unit.target: 私人芝士品味之旅包新鮮生蠔、朱古力和軟糖

trans-unit.source: Distant Ocean Islands & d'Entrecasteaux Channel waterways
trans-unit.target: 遠洋島嶼及德卡斯托海峽水道

trans-unit.source: Cape Bruny Lighthouse Tour & short nature walks
trans-unit.target: 布魯尼角燈塔導賞團和自然步道

trans-unit.source: Inclusions

trans-unit.target: 徒步燈塔觀光及自然風光導賞之旅

trans-unit.target: 取消附例

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Book
trans-unit.target: 預訂前須知

trans-unit.source: Children 2 and younger are complimentary.
trans-unit.target: 2 歲或以下小童免費。

trans-unit.source: Maximum group size is 16 people.
trans-unit.target: 團體人數上限為 16 人。

trans-unit.source: Know Before You Go
trans-unit.target: 出發前須知

trans-unit.source: Gratuity is not included and is left to individual discretion.
trans-unit.target: 不包括小費，參加者應自行決定是否給予。

trans-unit.source: You should wear comfortable clothing, walking shoes, and bring a jacket.
trans-unit.target: 閣下應穿著舒適的衣物、步行鞋及攜帶外套。

trans-unit.source: Taipei Tea Culture Day Tour
trans-unit.target: 台北茶文化一日遊

trans-unit.source: {1}Enjoy a gondola ride and admire the surrounding vistas of Maokong mountains before you take a stroll around Old Street.
trans-unit.target: {1}在老街周圍漫步前享受纜車和欣賞貓空山周邊的景觀。

trans-unit.source: Admire the beautifully lush landscapes of the Bagua Tea Plantation and be astounded by the gorgeous Qiandao Lake in the background on this full-day tea culture trip.
trans-unit.target: 在這全日茶文化之旅，欣賞八卦茶園的精美景觀，並觀看千島湖華麗的景色。

trans-unit.source: {2}{3}{4}Begin your day trip with a ride on a gondola and be swept away by the spectacular surroundings of the Maokong mountains.

As you descend, have a chance to visit the Chih Nan Temple and later walk along the Old Street and see age-old structures like arched red brick hallways, traditional columns, and ancient wooden plaques along alleys and arcades.
trans-unit.target: As you descend, have a chance to visit the Chih Nan Temple and later walk along the Old Street and see age-old structures like arched red brick hallways, traditional columns, and ancient wooden plaques along alleys and arcades.

trans-unit.source: {5}{6}{7}Next, make your way to the Bagua Tea Plantation, one of the largest and most photographed tea plantations in Taiwan.
trans-unit.target: {5}{6}{7}接下來，用自己的方式前往八卦茶園，這是規模最大及最常上鏡的台灣茶園之一。

trans-unit.source: Marvel at the grandeur of emerald green tea gardens amid fresh mountain air.
trans-unit.target: 欣賞翠綠的茶園及呼吸清新的山間空氣。

trans-unit.source: On the way back to your hotel, admire the majestic Qiando Lake (Thousand Island Lake), a man-made lake noted for its crystal water, peculiar-looking caves, and verdurous mountains, and finally stop at Taipei's Pinglin Tea Museum to learn and get a first-hand look at how tea is processed.
trans-unit.target: On the way back to your hotel, admire the majestic Qiando Lake (Thousand Island Lake), a man-made lake noted for its crystal water, peculiar-looking caves, and verdurous mountains, and finally stop at Taipei's Pinglin Tea Museum to learn and get a first-hand look at how tea is processed.

trans-unit.source: Redemption Instructions
trans-unit.target: 換領方法

trans-unit.source: You must contact My Taiwan Tour at least 48 hours before your activity date to confirm your reservation and arrange transportation.
trans-unit.target: 您必須於活動日期開始的至少 48 小時前聯絡 My Taiwan Tour 以確認您的預訂並安排交通。

trans-unit.source: Use the contact details on this voucher.
trans-unit.target: 請使用此代用券上的聯絡資料。

trans-unit.source: Upon pickup, please present your confirmation/voucher or photo ID in exchange for your activity.
trans-unit.target: 請於獲接送時出示確認門票/代用券或附有照片的身份證明，以換領活動。
